str_glob_spoints("dg","dg","dh").
str_spoints("alias1",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("alias2",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("alias3",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("alias4",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("bar1",s_func,fn_exit,"g.a","__arg0*").
str_spoints("bar1",s_func,fn_exit,"g.b","__arg0*").
str_spoints("bar2",s_func,fn_exit,"g.a","__arg0*").
str_spoints("foo1",s_func,fn_exit,"g.a","__arg0*").
str_spoints("more1",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","mg*").
str_spoints("more2",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("more2",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","mg*").
str_spoints("more2",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg1","mg*").
str_spoints("nest1",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","ng*").
str_spoints("nest2",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","ng*").
str_spoints("nest2",s_loop{"s#0"},fn_entry,"__arg0","ng*").
str_spoints("oddacc",s_func,fn_entry,"__arg0","h").
str_spoints("usegh",s_func,fn_exit,"dh","__arg0*").
